channel.title: Sam Robbins' Website on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Sam Robbins' Website on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hugo Portfolio Website
item.description: I created my portfolio website using Hugo and UIKit, it serves as an online resume containing all my work. This has been created as a theme so that others can use and adapt it. Sections Homepage The homepage provides the basic information about you, including links to social media, skills you have, things you’ve done and your education. This page makes good use of UIKit grid and cards for organising all the information and ensuring it is responsive to work on mobile devices.

item.title: Making a new Website
item.description: For a long time this website has had a couple of links to contact me, but those days are over. Now I have a brand new Hugo website with a custom written theme complete with A homepage with more social links, and description of my skills An about page with description of who I am A portfolio page to showcase all my projects A blog Why Hugo? The first question is why a site builder?
